meanings.definition: People who have a strong desire for food, especially in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: The chowhounds at the party finished all the snacks in no time.
meanings.sent2: The chowhounds always look forward to the buffet at the family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The chowhounds were so excited about the potluck that they arrived early.
meanings.sent4: The chowhounds devoured the pizza like a pack of hungry wolves.
meanings.sent5: The image of the chowhounds feasting on the barbecue will stay with me forever.

meanings.sent1: After the hike, they chowhounded the sandwiches like they hadn't eaten in days.
meanings.sent2: The kids chowhound their Halloween candy as soon as they get home.
meanings.sent3: He chowhounds his favorite dessert as if it's the last one on earth.
meanings.sent4: She chowhounded the popcorn during the movie, not leaving any for others.
meanings.sent5: The raccoons chowhound the leftovers from the campsite every night.
